ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Hello, I have great news!!!
ygData.messageBody:
Virus? What?
luv,
-Su

> MUaddib74447 you are infected with a virus which u may unknowingly be
> propagating through this message board. Please clean your system
> before you post again.
>

> you for your advice. And, If you have more please send it my way.
> David
